segments.content: Many blog articles talk about loading api/async data in React apps, with `componentDidMount`, `useEffect`, Redux, Apollo...
segments.sourceMdx: Many blog articles talk about loading api/async data in React apps, with `componentDidMount`, `useEffect`, Redux, Apollo...

segments.content: Yet, all those articles are **generally optimistic**, and never mention something important to consider: race conditions could happen, and your UI may end up in an **inconsistent state**.
